column4: try waiting for the next ubuntu release. Updated and tested graphics drivers will be included
manually updating your drivers is of course possible, but you really need to know what you're doing. I'd suggest that you wait for the 9.04 release
well it's scheduled for April 2009, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/JauntyReleaseSchedule  for additional information. If you're really anxious you could install the Release Candidate when it is out
